name: #422 Emma's Star Quilt Pattern
description:
Doll Quilt:  21" x 28"
Crib Size:  40" x 54"
Twin Size:  67" x 80 1/2"
Queen Size:  80 1/2" x 107 1/2"


This is a very simple quilt to make. The blocks are separated by sashings which form the stars.  You can make as many stars as you want or as few.  Goes together fast and you can use up your scraps or yardage requirements are provided.


#422

name: #415 Diamond Patch Quilt Pattern
description:
DIAMOND PATCH QUILT PATTERN



Crib size:  39" X 45"
Twin size:  60" X 90"
Queen size:  102" X 128"


This pattern is perfect for using 5" charms!


Charm Pack requirements: (This is just for the print fabrics)
 Crib - 1 charm pack,
 Twin - 4 charm packs,
Queen - 4 charm packs PLUS 1 Layer Cake 




This is a fast and easy quilt.  Make it up in no time at all.  I make my crib size quilts so you don't have to piece the backing.  This quilt is also easy because the border is built-in. When you sew the diagonal rows together, you are also sewing on the border fabric at the same time.  No more wavy borders to deal with!


#415
